author: Paul Kasabian
title: Chad Ochocinco Plays Madden 20 with Fans on Twitch for EA Sports' 'Stay & Play'
description: Former  NFL  wide receiver Chad Ochocinco hit the sticks once again to promote EA's #StayAndPlay campaign, which asks people to stay home during the COVID-19 pandemic...
content:
AJ Mast/Associated Press
Former NFL wide receiver Chad Ochocinco hit the sticks once again to promote EA's #StayAndPlay campaign, which asks people to stay home during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Ochocinco has taken part in this initiative in the past, and he pl… [+790 chars]
